nodes.text: A galaxy was a massive collection of stars, star systems, planets, moons, asteroids, comets, nebulas, star clusters, black holes, and other celestial bodies residing within the universe. One known galaxy was the galaxy home to the Galactic Republic and the Galactic Empire, also notable for containing the Wellspring of Life which gave birth to the midi-chlorians. Another was the Rishi Maze.
There were companion galaxies orbiting around larger ones, the galaxy had at least two.
Taka Jamoreesa, when advertising themselves as a pilot, was said to be "wanted" in eighteen galaxies.
In the hands of Darth Vader, the Mustafarian Bright Star artifact had the capability to crumble entire galaxies, where the Sith Lord would sacrifice their vitality in his insatiable hunger.
